comment: If you're not a serious student and if you don't want to work your butt off find another class. The good thing is that she will definitely work with you if you're not just taking up space.

The person is nice; the teacher is a bit over the top and crazy at times.  She randomly adds more and more to the already jam-packed syllabus. She believes in doing to learn, yet doing doesn't always help if you don't understand what you are doing! She might be awesome during a regular semester but for a summer semester the workload is unrealistic.
